from fastai2.vision.all import *
from fastexplorer.all import *
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
path = untar_data(URLs.MNIST_TINY)
dls = ImageDataLoaders.from_folder(path)
learn = cnn_learner(dls, resnet18, pretrained=False)
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
m = learn.model
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
#srv
learn.fastexplorer(True)
